This behavior differs from images added to posts using the '+' button in the editor. **Expected Behavior:** Images added to posts using Markdown are displayed the same as images added to posts using the '+' button in the editor. This means they should be center aligned and the caption should be displayed if a caption is provided. ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Add a Markdown element to a post. 2. Add an image to the Markdown element. 3. Add an image element to the post not using Markdown. 4.
